name: 5. Midnight Grid
description: Dark theme with Work Sans and Inter fonts
instructions: Create a modern dark theme with clean Work Sans headings and Inter body text. Use sky blue (#64B5F6) for primary accents and rose (#E57373) for highlights. Perfect for technical content in low-light environments.

image_style.prompt: Create modern technical images with grid-based layouts and clean diagrams. Use sky blue (#64B5F6) and rose (#E57373) accents on dark backgrounds (#121212). Style should feel technical, modern, and precise.
